nodes.text: Grub-tea was a bitter-tasting tea drink. The Human bounty hunter Jango Fett brewed and drank some grub-tea during his stay on the planet Geonosis in 22 BBY.
Grub-tea first appeared in Boba Fett: The Fight to Survive, a young readers book written by Terry Bisson and published in 2002. The Fight to Survive is the first book of the Boba Fett series.
